div.p: Michigan Great Lakes Virtual Academy partners with families to awaken the joy of learning in students and help them become self-motivated learners with greater academic success and confidence. Michigan-certified teachers provide guidance and work with students in live, online classes. An engaging, highly interactive curriculum challenges students with traditional core courses, art, music, world languages, career technical education electives, and more. We also offer the Destinations Career Academy, which gives high school students the opportunity to explore career options and gain an edge for the future. And our dual-enrollment program allows qualified high school students to earn college credits on select courses.
